attributes.action: Life skills introduced into secondry school education
attributes.additional_details:
Petition for the introduction of life skills into secondary school education to coincide with personal studies lessons already given .
Lessons on:
Finance: mortgages, loans, how to open a bank account, how credit works, money management.
Parenting: roles of a parent and the responsibilities it brings.
Respect for others and respecting other peoples beliefs and values.
Basic first aid and how to respond in an emergency or threatening situation.
More work experience that isn't so limited.
